mapper.insert: insert into interview( INTERVIEW_SEQ, INTERVIEW_TITLE, INTERVIEW_DD, INTERVIEW_TIME, INTERVIEW_TYPE, INTERVIEW_STATUS, ADMISSION_ID, REG_ID )VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{dd}, #{time}, #{type}, #{state}, #{admissionId}, #{regId} )
INSERT INTO interview_detail ( INTERVIEW_DETAIL_SEQ, INTERVIEW_SEQ, ANSWER_SEQ, ANSWER_VALUE, REG_ID ) VALUE( #{detailSeq}, #{seq}, #{answerSeq}, #{answerValue}, #{regId} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.INTERVIEW_TYPE, a.INTERVIEW_SEQ , a.INTERVIEW_TITLE, a.INTERVIEW_TIME, a.INTERVIEW_STATUS, a.INTERVIEW_DD FROM INTERVIEW A where a.ADMISSION_ID = #{admissionId} and a.INTERVIEW_DD = #{requestDate}

select b.INTERVIEW_TYPE , c.SYMPTOM_TITLE from interview_detail a inner join interview_risk c on a.ANSWER_SEQ = c.INTERVIEW_SEQ inner join interview b on b.INTERVIEW_SEQ = a.INTERVIEW_SEQ where a.INTERVIEW_SEQ = #{id};
